label_text:
Welcome to Billowing Bizzards!
Start by moving around and collecting snow.
(WASD/Arrow Keys)

Most weapons attack automatically, go near an enemy to attack it.
(Kill an enemy)

When you get hurt, you can also move around to heal but you won't get any snow.
(Heal to full)

Great job! You survived the day, now you can buy upgrades from the shop.
Click on this slot then buy an upgrade.
(Buy an upgrade)
